availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: W. Thomas Cassady (Oldham County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Isabel Cassady. Father of Richard Cassady, Thomas D. Cassady, Neville Cassady, William M. Cassady, James Cassady and Robert Cassady. Farmer in Oldham County in 1850. Farmer in Oldham County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 248.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, City/District, p. 875
Find A Grave, "Weston Thomas Cassady (1821-1899)," Memorial #84113997, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84113997 (accessed December 3, 2018).
